home.description: Accessible and customizable UI components for professional web applications. Built with accessibility standards and designed to adapt to any design system.
home.developer: Built by a developer for developers.

features.title: Reusable Components
features.description: A wide variety of ready-to-use components, from buttons to forms.

features.title: Consistent Design
features.description: All components follow a coherent design to ensure a uniform user experience.

features.title: Accessibility
features.description: Components built with best accessibility practices in mind.

features.title: Easy Customization
features.description: Thanks to Tailwind CSS, you can easily customize styles and variants.

features.title: Comprehensive Documentation
features.description: Detailed guides and practical examples to help you integrate and use each component.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Full access to the source code so you can adapt it to your needs.

features.title: Regular Updates
features.description: New components and continuous improvements based on community feedback.

features.title: TypeScript Support
features.description: All components are written in TypeScript, providing static typing and editor autocompletion.

features.title: React Compatibility
features.description: Specifically designed to integrate seamlessly with React applications.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: Lightweight and optimized components for top performance in your applications.

features.title: Customizable Themes
features.description: Support for light and dark themes, with the option to create your own.

features.title: Easy Integration
features.description: Designed to integrate smoothly into any existing React project.
